pages.text: There is a variety of aggressions levels based on your companion type to control the behaviour of your companion more in detail.$(br2)$(bold)Aggressive Levels$()$(list)Passive $(list)Neutral $(list)Aggressive

$(bold)Passive$()$(br)Your companion will never attack, even if the companion was attacked.$(br2)$(bold)Neutral$()$(br)Your companion will attack your target or anything which attacks them.$(br2)$(bold)Aggressive$()$(br)Your companion will automatic attack specific targets.$(br2)
